exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_jpg" y="-254" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Group id="gridBgGroup" height="510" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="190"/>
	<e:Group id="gridGroup" height="510" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="190" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true"/>
	<e:Group id="playerGroup" height="510" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="190" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true"/>
	<e:Group id="resultGroup" height="1150" width="640">
		<e:Rect id="blackBg" height="1150" width="640" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
		<e:Image id="popBg" source="result_popbg_png" y="202" x="47"/>
		<e:Image id="failText" source="result_fail_png" y="402" x="95"/>
		<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="result_share_png" x="50" y="660"/>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="result_again_png" x="373" y="660"/>
		<e:Image id="lookBtn" source="result_look_png" y="750" x="236"/>
		<e:Image id="successText" source="resule_success_png" y="416" x="114"/>
		<e:Image id="luckBtn" source="result_luckbtn_png" y="496" x="210"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="luckGroup" height="1150" width="640" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Rect height="1150" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
		<e:Scroller id="luckScroller" width="600" height="766" x="20" y="96" skinName="skins.ScrollerSkin">
			<e:Group id="luckScrollerGroup" height="950">
				<e:layout>
					<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="top" gap="0"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Image id="okBtn" source="result_okBtn_png" y="878" x="210"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PlayerUISkin" width="110" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="girl0" source="A1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="girl1" source="A2_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_jpg" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="title" source="home_title_png" y="60" x="25"/>
	<e:Group id="startGroup" height="324" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="268">
		<e:Image id="startBtn" source="home_start_png" x="59" y="216"/>
		<e:Image id="introduceBtn" source="home_introduce_png" x="365" y="216"/>
		<ns1:PlayerUI id="girl" y="60" skinName="PlayerUISkin" x="265"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="ruleGroup" width="640" height="200" y="874" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image id="ruleBg" source="game_rulebg_png" y="-612" x="-2"/>
		<e:Image id="bigGril" source="home_girl_png" rotation="-15" y="-47" x="611"/>
		<e:Scroller id="ruleScroller" width="640" y="-523" height="382">
			<e:Group>
				<e:Image id="ruleText" source="game_rule_png" y="13" x="92"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Image id="arrow" source="arrow_png" y="-107" horizontalCenter="-45.5"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LuckSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Group height="200" width="200" x="216" bottom="105">
		<e:Image id="rulebg" source="game_rulebg_png" y="-642" x="-211"/>
		<e:Image id="luckText" source="luck_text_png" x="-166" y="-554"/>
		<e:Image id="qrcode" source="game_qrcode_png" x="-169" bottom="-14"/>
		<e:Image id="girl" source="home_girl_png" x="62" rotation="-15" y="-47"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="logo" source="LODING_png" x="249" y="310"/>
	<e:Label id="processLabel" text="35%" y="474" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="123" x="259"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="640" height="1150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="resultGroup" height="1056" width="640" y="94">
		<e:Image id="girl" source="home_girl_png" x="262" y="693" rotation="-15"/>
		<e:Image id="resultBg" source="game_rulebg_png" y="88"/>
		<e:Image id="prizebg" source="prize_bg_png" x="42" y="178"/>
		<e:Label id="prizeLabel" text="标签" x="106" y="230" width="382" height="44" textColor="0x104EB3" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Image id="moneybg" source="prizemoney_png" x="385" y="198"/>
		<e:Image id="moneyImg" source="prize6_png" x="406" y="217"/>
		<e:Group id="prizeGroup" height="200" width="200" x="399" y="187">
			<e:Image id="itemImg" source="prize1_png" x="6" bottom="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:EditableText id="codeLabel" width="289" height="46" x="82" y="321" textColor="0x010000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LuckTextSkin" width="530" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="luck_bg_png" x="1" y="3"/>
	<e:Label id="nameLabel" text="玩家123" x="31" y="13" textColor="0x070995" width="433" textAlign="left" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="25"/>
	<e:Label id="prizeLabel" y="54" textColor="0x070995" text="什么什么面膜" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textAlign="left" width="369" x="127" size="25"/>
</e:Skin>
